values: Contact us if your online access has been temporarily locked.

You may be eligible to transfer your retail contract or lease account agreement to another qualified person (transferee). The transferee can download a new application, complete it and mail it directly to Ally.

Residents of Alaska, Colorado, Florida, Indiana, Iowa, Maine, Massachusetts, Minnesota, South Dakota and Wisconsin should contact their dealer for assistance in purchasing a leased vehicle.

SmartBuy®/Ally Buyer’s Choice® accounts don't qualify for transfer. Retail contract rates aren’t transferable.
Sorry, I cannot understand that. Please rephrase the question.

We offer several options, including online, mail or phone.

Online Auto Pay (automatic withdrawal) 
Set up automatic recurring payments.

One-Time Payments: 
Schedule one-time payments online or use Ally Auto Mobile Pay. Download for iPhone and Android

Mail 
Send a scheduled payment to: 
Payment Processing Center 
P.O. Box 9001951 
Louisville, KY 40290-1951

Send payment disputes, payments with restrictions or endorsements, or customer service correspondence to: 
Ally Financial 
P. O. Box 380901 
Bloomington, MN 55438

Online Debit Card Payment

Make a one-time online debit card payment through a third-party service provider for a fee.

Phone 
Call 1-888-925-2559 to pay over the phone. A convenience fee will apply.
For app related feedback/comments/ratings you can do it on Google Play/Apple iStore. (Product related feedback will come in detail in later phase).
